channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch dives into Isaiah 51 and 52, examining the Lord?s commands to, ?Listen to me!? along with pleas from Israel to the Lord to awaken and arise to his children?s defense. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Faith In The Heartland: Revisited
channel.desc: From Saint Francis Xavier Basilica, Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Christopher Podhajsky discuss their spiritual journeys carrying the Blessed Sacrament up the Mississippi River. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Jesus journeyed into the desert to be tested by the devil. He did not yield, putting his trust in God alone and doing his will. Jesus? example shows we too can withstand temptation, and find in God the way to salvation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy welcome author and Catholic life and relationship coach, Rose Sweet, to the show to speak about her book, ?My Type of Holiness? and how we can strive for sainthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: Part 2 of EWTN?s continuing series looks at influential theologian and philosopher, St. Augustine of Hippo. The story of his conversion, baptism and extraordinary life epitomizes the transforming power of grace. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Perou : Les Huit Meres
channel.desc: Au d?but des ann?es 1980, une organisation r?volutionnaire communiste appel?e Sendero Luminoso ? Sentier lumineux ? a lanc? une op?ration terroriste brutale dans les r?gions rurales des Andes p?ruviennes, utilisant la terreur sans piti?. L'arm?e envoy?e pour combattre le groupe terroriste a ?galement fait un usage excessif de la force, d?truisant des villages et tuant de nombreux civils innocents. En 2003, ? la fin de 20 ans d'insurrection, plus de 70 000 personnes ?taient mortes ou avaient disparu. Encore aujourd'hui, les traumatismes occasionn?s par ce conflit affectent profond?ment la vie quotidienne du peuple p?ruvien. La Congr?gation des S?urs missionnaires de J?sus Verbe et Victime apporte soins et r?confort ? ces r?gions ?loign?es. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord travel to Quebec to examine the life of Blessed Frederic, a Franciscan priest who served the Church in Europe, the Holy Land and Canada. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Fr. Patrick Peyton
channel.desc: A look at the charismatic priest who pioneered the use of radio and TV to bring the rosary to the world, staging massive rallies and enlisting Hollywood celebrities in his singular mission. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Wayne Sattler joins to speak on ways to engage our hearts to go beyond thinking of God as an idea, and rather knowing, loving and serving the person who is Jesus Christ. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Long Ride Home With Bear Woznick
channel.desc: Host Bear Woznick and his sidekick Tony Orband pass through the eye of Hurricane Matthew as they begin their cross-country motorcycle trip from Florida's Atlantic coast to California's Pacific shores. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Footsteps Of St. Paul
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa takes you to Athens, Greece where he discusses the First Letter of St. Paul to the Corinthians, and how Paul contrasts the wisdom of the world with the wisdom of God. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Sebastian Walshe explores what we know about the honored saint, St. Joseph, while looking at what little is said about him in the Bible and what that tells us about who he was. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA

channel.desc: At the 2024 Lift Jesus Higher Rally, hear Fr. Mathias Thelen proclaim the reasons why following Jesus is always worth the risk. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Church: God's Plan, The Ii
channel.desc: Noted author and retreat master, Fr. Thomas Dubay begins his examination of the Church as the historical unfolding of God's saving plan for humanity. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Hi Lucy

channel.desc: Father Wade Menezes, C.P.M., Fathers of Mercy, gives a brief overview as to why we should study the Four Last Things, and a discussion of the first of our five topics: Death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Venezuela "un Chemin Moins Frequente"
channel.desc: En pleine crise sociale, financi?re et politique, de jeunes V?n?zu?liens continuent de r?pondre ? l'appel de Dieu ? consacrer leur vie ? la pr?trise. Des jeunes hommes qui veulent servir leurs s?urs et fr?res et faire partie de la solution, plut?t que d'?tre des t?moins passifs de la crise dans leur pays. Leur amour profond pour Dieu se traduit par l'amour et le service aux autres. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Matthew explains St. Martin of Tours, who served Christ and others in the military and discusses the need for Military Chaplains. Retired Marine Sergeant Buster Miscusi joins. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Jason Evert, founder of the Chastity Project, along with author Mary Rick Hasson and Fr. Shenan Boquet provide advice for parents discussing human sexuality with their children. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about honoring Mary, why the Orthodox do not accept the dogma of the Immaculate Conception, and Jesus having cousins rather than half-brothers. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.title: Reality Check: The Four Last Things Death, Judgment, Heaven, Hell
channel.desc: Fr, Wade discusses certain Helps to the Spiritual Life to ensure our growing relationship in love with our merciful God - the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother says that we should always vote for life and that we need politicians who are concerned not only about our earthly lives but also about our spiritual lives. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Father Sebastian Walshe dives into the enigmatic figure in Sacred Scripture, St. Joseph, noting more about how scripture doesn?t tell us a lot by way of typology or prefigurement. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: James McCullough interviews Sebastian Morello, a formation advisor with the Archdiocese of Southwark, discussing society's focus on the individual and the radical materialism that has eroded Christian faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert: Catholic Choral Masterpieces
channel.desc: Filmed on location at the Music and Beyond festival in Ottawa, Canada, the Theatre of Early Music performs Pergolesi?s Stabat Mater, the Concerto #2 for Oboe in D minor by Albinoni and Two Love Duets by Handel. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen discusses human nature in general. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).
